code: import{Button,FormControl,FormLabel,Input,InputGroup,InputRightElement,VStack,useToast}from'@chakra-ui/react';import axios from'axios';import Signup=()=>{let[name,setName]=useState();let[email,setEmail]=useState();let[password,setPassword]=useState();let[confirmPassword,setConfirmPassword]=useState();let[pic,setPic]=useState();let[show,setShow]=useState(false);let[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);let
